title: Client keeps disconnecting from chat and queus
body:
Hi, I came back to LOL after a few months break, downloaded the new client, but every once in a while I get this error
which says "Disconnected from chat", and it reconnects after a few seconds.
The problem is it kicks me from game queues and doesn't allow me to play with teams properly (I don't get the start game popup).
Is this a familiar problem? what can I do to solve it?

Thank you

replies.body: Getting disconnected from chat over and over is a pretty good sign that your network is having a hard time holding a solid connection with our chat servers. I'd first suggest looking over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there, but hit me back if that doesn't help!

Hello and thank you for the answer.
I checked my connection to the eune server by pinging it and got 100% packet response rate over a few hours, as well as the fact that I'm not lagging on any other game.
Nevertheless I tried following the insturctions on the guide without any success unfortunately.
Is there anything else to be done?

If you had 100% packet loss that's going to be the main problem. Losing 100% of packets basically means that *none* of the data is actually getting through to our servers. With those kinds of issues, I'd suggest reaching out to your ISP to make sure there isn't some type of outage that was going on at that time.

100% packet response rate, which means 0% packet loss over a course of a few hours... not 100% loss
(lost maybe 2 packets over 80k sent)

Ah I misread that, my bad! If you're not having any packet loss issues and updating your network settings wasn't able to help, let's go ahead and get you a little more specialized help. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or live chat and they'll be able to take a closer look at your logs to see whats going on.

Just wanted to add that I have a similar problem, except my chat just never connects. It always has the disconnect error saying "You've been disconnected from chat, attempting to reconnect...". I'm in the same boat in that I haven't played for quite a while and I'm trying to get back into it but I can't play with my mates because of this.
